content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements there is also a bonus garment schematic included in the pdf the brentwood men s shawl collared pullover is a classic crochet mens pullover that can be worn for years to come pair it with dress slacks for a dressier look or pair it with jeans for a more casual vibe kids sizes are available here 2 purchase the kit here 3 lion brand also has a full kit of the brentwood men s pullover 4 available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern below **sizing** the pattern is written in men s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large to fit chest 32-33 34-36 38-40 42-44 46-48 50-52 54-56 **instructions included for lengthening the sleeves & torso ** **yarn notes** the sample shown in the photos is lion brand wool ease / 4 / worsted weight yarn 80% acrylic / 20% wool / 197 yds / 3 oz / 180 m / 85 g other lighter worsted weight 4 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met yardage 1 450 1 550 1 650 1 850 2 100 2 300 2 500 **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a schematic and photo tutorials where needed the sweater is worked from the bottom up with minimal seaming shoulders only the collar is then added finally sleeves are then worked directly from the armhole openings and worked and shaped down to the cuff sweater design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & craftsy jennifer pionk all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take
